sentences.en: Aim at VIP high level customers of company provides a specialized service.
sentences.cn: 针对公司VIP高端用户群提供专门服务.

sentences.en: Airport VIP passage, police car leading and other VIP services.
sentences.cn: 协助办理机场VIP通道 及警车开道等贵宾服务.

sentences.en: Foreign experts had a head and skin test for VIP clients.
sentences.cn: 国外专家在为VIP客户 做头部皮肤健康的测试.

sentences.en: He was a VIP, but he had a frugal life.
sentences.cn: 他是位要人, 但生活俭朴.

sentences.en: Mr Jones: Oh, it's not mine. I've rented it - from VIP - DJs .
sentences.cn: 琼斯先生: 噢, 不是我的. 我从 VIP—DJ 那里租的.

sentences.en: Provide a good grade service of reception, and do VIP reception well.
sentences.cn: 提供优质前台服务, 做好VIP的 接待工作.

sentences.en: She waited in the VIP lounge.
sentences.cn: 她在贵宾休息室里等候着。

sentences.en: Supervise crowd control at the main entrance and VIP rooms'entrance.
sentences.cn: 在主要入口和VIP入口实施人群控制.

sentences.en: The standard stage, room quarter and VIP rooms are all available.
sentences.cn: 宽敞明亮的婚宴大厅配有标准舞台 、 包房区和VIP休息室.

sentences.en: They treated him like a VIP.
Tom was under the delusion that he was a VIP.
sentences.cn: 汤姆怀有错觉,认为自己是个要人.

sentences.en: VIP usually means Very Important People , but here VIP means Very Important Pets!
sentences.cn: 实际上, 在世界的某些地方,宠物享受到的是真正的VIP待遇.

sentences.en: We'll give her some VIP treatment and roll out the red carpet.
sentences.cn: 我们将给予她贵宾级礼遇，并且为她铺设红地毯。

sentences.en: You can apply for a VIP card to enjoy discount next time.
sentences.cn: 您可以办理一张VIP卡,以后消费时可以享受相应的折扣.

trans.tran_cn: very important people 贵宾，大人物，vasoactive intestinal peptide 血管活性肠肽，Video Interface Processor 视频接口处理器，Variable Information Processing 可变信息处理
